posts.post_title: SOLD - 1887-90 Old Judge N172 - Jim O'Rourke HOF RC (SGC 20)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very nice 1887-90 Old Judge N172 - Jim O'Rourke HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 20 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $595.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com
